projects.title: Supply Chain Management System
projects.description: This project is a Supply Chain Management (SCM) system for a production company in Kandy, managing product distribution via railway and truck transportation. It features scheduling, truck route management, and driver roster constraints. The system includes database design, procedures, triggers, and reporting for sales, popular items, and work hours.

projects.title: Nano Processor Design
projects.description: This project involves designing and simulating a digital system using Vivado. It includes Vivado project files, simulation source files with a slow clock, and generated bitstreams (minimum resource and extended versions). The repository also contains a text file with operational instructions and a final report detailing the design, testing, optimizations, and contributions.
